Text: The aspect ratio is messed up. It's some widescreen format squished to 4:3.
If you have VLC player, you can easily correct the aspect ratio. Cheers! :)
Oh, didn't know that. I usually use WMP, Media Player Classic, or my Xbox. The download was very fast btw.

Thanks for the up.  Terrible movie.

V=10 (after changing aspect ratio)
A=10 (the riffers' voices were at the right level)
M=0 (give up, Shyamalan)

I love MST3k and was so heartbroken when it was ended but now a friend told me about rifftrax and I'm excited, to those of you who don't know, this video has audio over top of it, poking fun at the film, for those of us who think the movie deserves such treatment, if that's not your thing, fine, i won't insult your intelligence, as easy as that may be, but just know that this movie has other audio over it mocking it before you download it. there now i've told you twice if you dont read comments before you download, which you should, then its not our, or the uploaders fault
